data.prayer: Father, help the 492 believers in Biskra to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Biskra, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Biskra access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary: On average, 38 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Biskra, Algeria.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Biskra, Algeria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Biskra, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Bedouin, Chaamba people. Make the Bedouin, Chaamba people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, please defend the 492 believers in Biskra against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Biskra do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Biskra, Algeria a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Biskra
location.cities_list: Biskra, Tolga, Sidi Khaled, Sidi Okba, Zeribet el Oued
location.cities_list_w_pop: Biskra (307,987), Tolga (68,246), Sidi Khaled (64,476), Sidi Okba (34,985), Zeribet el Oued (23,187)
